metadata.title: LUX | Luxury RIB Charter Sardinia
metadata.description: Exclusive RIB charter experience in La Maddalena Archipelago, Costa Smeralda and Bonifacio. Premium boat rentals with local experts.

hero.title: LUX
hero.subtitle: Exclusive RIB Charter Experience
hero.description: Discover the pristine waters of La Maddalena Archipelago, Costa Smeralda and Bonifacio with our premium charter experience.

chiSiamo.title: Chi Siamo
chiSiamo.p1: A young team with over 10 years of operational experience in the nautical sector. Our background in yacht handling and daily logistics ensures the highest quality of service.
chiSiamo.p2: Deep knowledge of the La Maddalena Archipelago, Costa Smeralda, and Bonifacio allows us to offer unique experiences tailored to your needs.
chiSiamo.p3: RIB rental supported by local professionals already active in the premium sector.

ilMezzo.title: Il Mezzo
ilMezzo.description: A luxury high-performance RIB designed for long daily routes. Focus on performance, autonomy, and long daily range (e.g., Bonifacio).

prezzi.title: Prezzi & Opzioni
prezzi.description: Rental available for Half Day, Full Day, and Evening Charter (May to August from 18:00). Fuel excluded from rental.

halfDay.title: Half Day
halfDay.description: Perfect for a quick escape to nearby coves

fullDay.title: Full Day
fullDay.description: Explore the full archipelago at your pace

evening.title: Evening Charter
evening.description: Sunset cruise with less traffic, more magic

eveningCharter.title: Evening Charter
eveningCharter.description: From May to August, evening charters from 18:00 offer a unique perspective of the archipelago. Experience the magic of Sardinian sunsets from the water.

lessTraffic.title: Less Traffic
lessTraffic.description: Iconic locations like Porto Madonna and Spargi are less crowded.

temperature.title: Perfect Temperature
temperature.description: Reduced nautical traffic and lower temperatures for greater comfort.

access.title: Better Access
access.description: Better access to protected coves and sea-accessible restaurants.

exclusive.title: Exclusive Experience
exclusive.description: A quieter and more exclusive sailing experience at sunset.

partenza.title: Punti di Partenza
partenza.description: Direct boarding from selected hotels and private marinas. Other points along Costa Smeralda on request.

ristoranti.title: Supporto Ristoranti
ristoranti.p1: No onboard kitchen service to maintain flexibility and allow you to choose the best culinary experiences.
ristoranti.p2: Possibility to disembark at sea-accessible restaurants — from simple trattorias to exclusive sea-view restaurants.
ristoranti.p3: Reservation support according to your preferences. Access to selected venues thanks to local operational relationships.

costruito.title: Costruito per Queste Acque
costruito.description: Our vessels are not ordinary boats — they are precision tools designed for the specific conditions of the La Maddalena Archipelago and Bonifacio Strait.

local.title: Locally Built
local.description: Vessels built locally in La Maddalena with the utmost attention to detail.

shallow.title: Shallow Water Ready
shallow.description: Designed for sailing in shallow waters and narrow passages of the archipelago.

stability.title: Optimized Stability
stability.description: Hull stability and maneuverability optimized for the Bonifacio Strait.

cta.title: Ready to Set Sail?
cta.description: Experience the beauty of the La Maddalena Archipelago on your own terms. Contact us to plan an unforgettable experience on the water.
cta.note: Hours are flexible and can be adjusted based on route and weather conditions.

footer.description: Exclusive RIB charter experience in La Maddalena Archipelago, Costa Smeralda and Bonifacio. Premium boat rentals with local experts.
